full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I GTOR CHOG BSKONGS BSO CHA LAGS DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @027A *, ,(MYUR MDZAD MGON PO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA BSGRUB CING GTOR MA 'BUL @027B BA'I RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS SU LEN TSUL MAN NGAG GIS RNAM PAR BRGYAN CING, RGYUD SDE DANG MI MTHUN PA'I LOG CHOS MANG POS MA BSLAD PAR MDOR BSDUS SHING CHA TSANG BAR BKOD PA 'DI NI, MANG DU THOS PA'I RDO RJE 'DZIN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS GNOD SBYIN GANG BA BZANG PO'I GANGS MGUL DBEN GNAS RIN CHEN 'BAR BA'I SDING SU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,BLA MA YI DAM BSRUNG MA'I TSOGS RNAMS KYI, ,SNGON GYI ZHAL BZHES DAM BCAS MA BSNYEL BAR, ,RNAL 'BYOR DPON SLOB MI NOR DGON GNAS BCAS, ,BSRUNG SKYOB MTHUN RKYEN BSGRUB PA'I DUS LA BAB,, ,,SA BCU NYED LA GNAS PA'I SEMS DPA' CHE, ,GZI BRJID ME LTAR 'BAR BA'I KHRO TSUL GYI, ,BSTAN LA SDANG BA'I DGRA BGEGS TSAR BCOD PA'I YE SHES MGON PO 'KHOR BCAS BKRA SHIS SHOG, ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,,)
